issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Fix a potential NPE in AbstractSchedulerPlanFollower

Thanks [~xiaoheipangzi] for the patch and for the tool. I am going to try it out.

LGTM +1.

CapacityScheduler, FifoScheduler and FairScheduler can return null for getAppsInQueue.

[~elgoiri]. Can please you push it on trunk and branch-2?

Thanks [~xiaoheipangzi] for the patch and [~giovanni.fumarola] for the review.
Committing to branch-2 and trunk.
